body_html:
I saw (line 85)
sess = tf.Session("grpc://" + cluster['worker'][0], config=default_config())
in your code.

Shouldn't it be
sess = tf.Session("grpc+verbs://" + cluster['worker'][0], config=default_config())
?
body_text:
I saw (line 85)
sess = tf.Session("grpc://" + cluster['worker'][0], config=default_config())
in your code.
Shouldn't it be

?
body:
I saw (line 85) 
```sess = tf.Session("grpc://" + cluster['worker'][0], config=default_config())```
 in your code. 

Shouldn't it be 
```sess = tf.Session("grpc+verbs://" + cluster['worker'][0], config=default_config())```
?
